useCase.name: Search for Digital Assets by Role
useCase.description: User searches for digital assets by specifying a role.

preconditions.precondition: User has access to the DAMS system.

useCase.trigger: User enters search terms and role.

mainSequence.step: User enters search terms and role (e.g., Illustrator, Photographer).
User sends search request with name and role.
Controller queries digital assets by name and role.
Controller filters assets by the specified role.
UI shows search results (assets categorized by illustrator, photographer, etc.) to the User.
